text: The Alveolata is a grouping of protists. One view is that it is a superphylum with at least four phyla. == Phyla == * Ciliates, very common protozoa, with many short cilia arranged in rows * Chromerida â€“ a marine phylum of photosynthetic protozoa * Apicomplexa, parasitic protozoa that lack locomotive structures except in gametes * Dinoflagellate, mostly marine flagellates, many of which have chloroplasts
title: Alveolate
